data.description_en: X-HUB holds the event in a very welcoming space and in partnership with XICAFU Snack Bar with the aim of making your night very lively with music, romantic messages and humor in the mix. You can't lose!

organizer.description:
EXPOSI√á√ïES
Realizamos exposi√ß√µes de arte que proporcionam uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel para o p√∫blico diversificado, sendo exposi√ß√µes de artes pl√°sticas, fotografia, esculturas, v√≠deos, √°udio entre outras.
A nossa galeria √© de f√°cil acesso para que os visitantes vindo de diferentes horizontes possam chegar com facilidade.

FORMA√á√ïES
Promovemos encontros peri√≥dicos com objectivo de treinar jovens e p√∫blico interessado na √°rea das industrias culturais e criativas. A cada sess√£o abordamos temas que promovem o desenvolvimento do conhecimento dos nossos formandos.
Para tal contamos com acad√©micos altamente qualificados e que dominam os tema abordado.

CONCERTOS
Temos apresenta√ß√µes de m√∫sica ao vivo que visam hospedar e nutrir m√∫sicos de todos os n√≠veis. Recebemos regularmente m√∫sicos locais e internacionais, permitindo que os entusiastas da m√∫sica experimentem diferentes g√™neros e estilos.

PODCASTS
Desenvolvemos podcasts sobre conte√∫dos relacionados a ind√∫stria criativa. Nestes s√£o abordados diversos assuntos ligados a m√∫sica, artes pl√°sticas e c√©nicas, artesanato e mais.

INCUBA√á√ÉO
Temos um programa para a profissionaliza√ß√£o dos m√∫sicos Mo√ßambicanos, atrav√©s de um conjunto de ac√ß√µes de assist√™ncia t√©cnica e art√≠stica nomeadamente: Cria√ß√£o de Website art√≠stico, Biografia profissionalizada, produ√ß√£o musical, assist√™ncia jur√≠dica, assessoria de comunica√ß√£o, resid√™ncias art√≠sticas e agenciamento.
organizer.address: Av. Ahmed Sekou Tour√© N¬∞ 1957 R/C Cidade de Maputo - Mozambique
organizer.description_en:
EXHIBITIONS
We hold art exhibitions that provide an incredible experience for a diverse audience, including exhibitions of fine arts, photography, sculptures, videos, audio, among others.
Our gallery is easily accessible so that visitors from different horizons can arrive with ease.

TRAININGS
We promote periodic meetings with the aim of training young people and interested audiences in the area of ‚Äã‚Äãcultural and creative industries. In each session we address topics that promote the development of our trainees‚Äô knowledge.
To this end, we have highly qualified academics who master the topics covered.

CONCERTS
We have live music performances that aim to host and nurture musicians of all levels. We regularly host local and international musicians, allowing music enthusiasts to experiment with different genres and styles.

PODCASTS
We develop podcasts about content related to the creative industry. These cover various subjects related to music, visual and performing arts, crafts and more.

INCUBATION
We have a program for the professionalization of Mozambican musicians, through a set of technical and artistic assistance actions, namely: Creation of an artistic website, professionalized biography, musical production, legal assistance, communication consultancy, artistic residencies and agency.

data.description:
Vamos fazer prost, no Oktoberfest, que vai tomar o jardim do Centro Cultural Mo√ßambicano-Alem√£o, no dia 26 de Outubro, a partir das 10h. Para trazer a atmosfera desta tradi√ß√£o b√°vara, transformaremos o nosso espa√ßo num cen√°rio r√∫stico. E, claro, n√£o faltar√° cerveja.
üìÖ Data: 26 de outubro  
üìç Local: CCMA
Te esperamos para esta primeira edi√ß√£o inesquec√≠vel!
data.name: Oktoberfest

organizer.description:
O Centro Cultural Mo√ßambicano-Alem√£o (CCMA)/Goethe-Zentrum Maputo, √© uma associa√ß√£o cultural mo√ßambicana, criada em 2017 na Cidade de Maputo, com o objectivo de promover, incentivar e favorecer:
1. O aprendizado da l√≠ngua alem√£ e do Xichangana,
2. O interc√¢mbio cultural entre Mo√ßambique, Alemanha e mais pa√≠ses e
3. A coopera√ß√£o com outros centros culturais e outras institui√ß√µes similares em Mo√ßambique e fora.
O CCMA √© parceiro de coopera√ß√£o oficial do Instituto-Goethe e faz parte da sua rede na regi√£o √Åfrica subsaariana. O Goethe-Institut √© a institui√ß√£o do Estado alem√£o para a promo√ß√£o da l√≠ngua e cultura alem√£ a n√≠vel global, com institutos e centros no mundo inteiro.
organizer.address: Av. Samora Machel #468, entrada Rua da Radio
organizer.name: CCMA - Centro Cultural Mo√ßambicano-Alem√£o
organizer.description_en:
The Mozambican-German Cultural Center (CCMA)/Goethe-Zentrum Maputo, is a Mozambican cultural association, created in 2017 in the City of Maputo, with the aim of promoting, encouraging and favoring:
1. Learning the German language and Xichangana,
2. Cultural exchange between Mozambique, Germany and other countries and
3. Cooperation with other cultural centers and other similar institutions in Mozambique and abroad.
CCMA is an official cooperation partner of the Goethe-Institute and is part of its network in the sub-Saharan Africa region. The Goethe-Institut is the German state institution for promoting the German language and culture globally, with institutes and centers all over the world.

data.description_en:
Let's do prost, at Oktoberfest, which will take over the garden of the Mozambican-German Cultural Center, on October 26th, starting at 10am. To bring the atmosphere of this Bavarian tradition, we will transform our space into a rustic setting. And, of course, there will be no shortage of beer.
üìÖ Date: October 26th  
üìç Location: CCMA
We are waiting for you for this unforgettable first edition!
